name: THE CAPRI CONNECTION
blurb: Development of the 3rd Adventure Game of a Trilogy where the set is a real place with real characters.

rewards.reward: SUPPORTER\r\n- Your name will be included in the credit page of the game and in the News/Kickstarter Supporters page of the www.caprisaga.com Official Web Site upon your request. You will partecipate to a contest with two weeks lead on non-backer players. The winner of the contest will be the first person in the world to complete the game.
PLAYER A\r\n- One copy of the game in digital delivery copy-protected format. Supporter status included.
PLAYER B\r\n- One copy of the game in boxed format shipped via special delivery mail. Supporter status included.
PLAYER C\r\n- One copy of the game in boxed format with extra handmade cover, numbered and signed by the authors, shipped via special delivery mail. Supporter status included.

VOICE OVER TALENT\r\n- Active participation to the game as Voice Over Talent. You should record an English text sent via e-mail by the authors, thus dubbing one of the characters of the game. The recorded material should be sent back to the authors via e-mail. You should select this option only after contacting directly the authors to verify if your voice fits with one of the available characters of the game and if you like the proposed role. In positive case and if you so desire, your name will be shown in the Characters/Actors/Voices page within the credits of the game.

ACTOR\r\n- Active participation to the game as Actor. You should send a number of photos of yourself acting as one the characters of the game as needed by the authors. The photos should be sent to the authors via e-mail. You should select this option only after contacting directly the authors to verify if your appearance fits with one of the available characters of the game and if you like the proposed role. If you so desire, your name will be shown in the Characters/Actors/Voices page within the credits of the game.\r\n- Actor option may include the Voice Over Talent option if you like.

TOURIST A\r\n- Meeting with one of the authors spending one day with you visiting one of the sites, at your choice, where the game was shot. Date and other arrangements to be agreed in advance by e-mail. Travel, food and hotel not included. Player C status included.

TOURIST B\r\n- Meeting with one of the authors spending two days with you visiting two sites, at your choice, where the game was shot. Date and other arrangements to be agreed in advance by e-mail. Travel, food and hotel not included. Player C status included.

SPONSOR\r\n- Inclusion in the game of a consistent set of photos of a premise such as a hotel, a restaurant, a shop, a tourist attraction located in the area covered by the game, that is the Italian Campania region.

SUPER TOURIST A\r\n- One week vacation in an apartment located in Amalfi where one of the actions of the game will be shot. The apartment has two large bedrooms, two bathrooms, kitchen, living area with a daybed, terrace and a gorgeous view of the Amalfi town. It can host two couples and one/two children. Pictures of the apartment are shown in the News/Apartment page of the Official Web Site. Date and other arrangements to be agreed by e-mail. Suggested period is May to October because of the nice weather. Travel, food and maid services during the week not included. Player C status included.
SUPER TOURIST B\r\n- Super Tourist A status + Meeting with one of the authors spending one day with you visiting Amalfi and surroundings.

SUPER TOURIST C\r\n- Two weeks vacation in an apartment located in Amalfi, where one of the actions of the game will be shot. The apartment has two large bedrooms, two bathrooms, kitchen, living area with a daybed, terrace and a gorgeous view of the Amalfi town. It can host two couples and one/two children. Pictures of the apartment are shown in the News/Apartment page of the Official Web Site. Date and other arrangements to be agreed by e-mail. Suggested period is May to October because of the nice weather. Travel and food not included. Maid service at the end of the first week included. Player C status included.
SUPER TOURIST D\r\n- Super Tourist C status + Meeting with one of the authors spending one day with you visiting Amalfi and surroundings where the game was shot.
SUPER TOURIST E\r\n- Super Tourist C status + Meeting with one of the authors spending two days with you visiting Amalfi plus one place at your choice where the game was shot.
